feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-23T00:30:31.162742Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;加州理工学院诺贝尔奖获得者庆祝他的 100 岁生日，然后回去工作</stitle>; <id>;https://www.latimes.com/science/story/2023-07-21/caltech-nobel- laureate-rudy-marcus-turns-100-and-gets-back-to-work</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T19:30:18.052973Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.latimes.com/science/story/2023-07-21/caltech-nobel-laureate-rudy-marcus-turns-100-and-gets-back -to-work"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ca-times.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/aa698a7/2147483647/strip/true/crop/4122x2688+0+ 0/resize/1200x783!/quality/80/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalifornia-times-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com%2Ff6%2F93%2F74bbf1dd46a6ad8c553e8da16c8b%2F1324895-sci-caltech-nobel-laureate-turns-100- 02-mjc.jpg" style="宽度: 220px;身高：144px;" />;<br />;加州理工学院化学教授鲁迪·马库斯 (Rudy Marcus) 通过继续工作庆祝了自己的 100 岁生日。同事和以前的学生聚集在一起向马库斯表示敬意，称他为榜样和科学家的优秀典范。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-caltech-nobel-laureate-celebrates-his-100th-birthday-then-gets-back-to-work" target ="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36828811" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;重塑美国心理健康危机的急诊室</stitle>; <id>;https://www.newy orker.com/science/annals-of-medicine/reinventing-the-er-for-americas-mental-health-crisis</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T23:30:18.057582Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.newyorker.com/science/annals-of-medicine/reinventing-the-er-for-americas-mental-health-crisis" />; <author>; <name>;if-curious</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=if-curious</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.newyorker.com/photos/648c86bd1f95b9ee5ffd8b79/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/_DSF2252.jpg" style="width: 220 像素；身高：294px;" />;<br />;Kim Mitlyng 是一名急诊科治疗师，当她的家人经历心理健康危机时，她亲身体验了支离破碎、杂乱无章的心理医疗保健系统。这促使她从事精神科急诊工作，并最终创建了 Em 单位，为危机中的患者提供一个平静的公共环境，进行综合评估和治疗。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reinventing-the- er-for-americas-mental-health-crisis" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36830707" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Egregoria：3D 城市没有网格的构建器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Uriopass/Egregoria</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T20:30:18.058518Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/Uriopass/Egregoria"/>; <author>; <name>;dosshell</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dosshell</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.githubusercontent.com/media/Uriopass/Egregoria/master/assets/screen2.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Egregoria 是一款独立城市建设者，专注于城市的社会经济方面，具有物流元素。它仍处于早期开发和开源阶段，希望让更多人参与其开发。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#egregoria-3d-city-builder-without-a-grid" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36829374" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;TokenFlow：实现一致视频编辑的一致扩散功能</stitle>; <id>;https://diffusion-tokenflow.github.io/</id>; <updated>;2023 -07-22T22:30:18.059390Z</updated>; <link href="https://diffusion-tokenflow.github.io/"/>; <author>; <name>;puttycat</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=puttycat</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://diffusion-tokenflow.github.io/pics/pipeline.png"样式=“宽度：220px； height: 117px;" />;<br />;Text2video-zero 和 Tune-a-video 是文本到视频扩散模型，可从文本生成视频。结构和内容引导的视频合成以及即插即用扩散功能也可用于文本驱动的图像到图像转换。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tokenflow-consistent-diffusion-features-for-consist-video-editing" target="_blank">;[summ ary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;iCloud 如何工作？加上新版本的 Cirrus</stitle>; <id>;https://electiclight.co/2023/07/17/how-does-icloud-work-plus-a-new-version-of-cirrus/</id>; <updated>;2023-07- 22T21:30:18.061023Z</更新>; <link href="https://eclecticlight.co/2023/07/17/how-does-icloud-work-plus-a-new-version-of-cirrus/"/>; <作者>; <name>;janandonly</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=janandonly</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://electiclightdotcom.files.wordpress.com/2023/07/icloudintro1.jpg?w=1024" style="宽度：220px; height: 191px;" />;<br />;iCloud 和 iCloud Drive 是使用 Mac 和 Apple 设备的基本功能。本文介绍了 iCloud，特别是 iCloud Drive 现在如何工作的基础知识，并提供了我的免费实用程序 Cirrus 的新版本来帮助您研究它们。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-does-icloud-work-plus-a-new-version-of-cirrus" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36830062" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;美国最大的工具公司无法在美国生产扳手</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wsj.com/articles /craftsman-america-wrench-stanley-black-decker-reshoring-factory-1125792f</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T22:30:18.062715Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/craftsman-america-wrench-stanley-black-decker-reshoring-factory-11257 92f"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ortusdux</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ortusdux</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.wsj.net/im-821631/?width=1000&size=0.8" style="width: 220px; height: 275px;" />;<br />;一家高度自动化的德克萨斯工厂本应将工匠机械工具的制造带回美国海岸。这个耗资 9000 万美元的项目因设备问题和生产缓慢而注定失败。世界上最大的工具公司不知道如何制造扳手。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#americas-largest-tool-company-couldnt-make-a-wrench-in-americ a" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36828861" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;充分利用 Apple Silicon 的力量：2 个核心功能 (2022)</stitle>; < id>;https://electiclight.co/2022/10/05/making-the-most-of-apple-silicon-power-2-core-capability/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T19:30:18.063522Z</updated>; <link href="https://electiclight.co/2022/10/05/making-the-most-of-apple-silicon-power- 2-core-capability/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;nateb2022 </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nateb2022</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://electiclightdotcom.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/cropped-electiclightlogo-e1421784280911.png?w=2 00" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;Apple的M系列芯片采用ARM的big.LITTLE架构进行异构多处理（HMP），具有两种类型的CPU核心。P核心比E核心具有更高的频率和更多的功能单元，从而带来更好的性能。但E核心的功耗更低，仍然可以实现显着的吞吐量。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#making-the-most-of-apple-silicon-power- 2-core-capability-2022" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36828927" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Databag – 微型自托管联合信使去中心化网络</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/balzack/databag</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T18:30:18.064321Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/balzack/databag"/>; <author>; <name>;triyambakam</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=triyambakam</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/balzack/databag/main/doc/icon.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;该应用程序可在 fdroid 以及 google 和 apple 商店上使用。您可以在此处测试该项目，但不要发布任何重要内容，因为该服务器会定期擦除。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#databag-tiny-self-hosted-federated-messenger-for-the-decentralized-web" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36828288" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我们如何看待自己以及我们如何看待他人 (2008) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;http://courses.washington.edu/pbafhall/514/51 4%20Readings/2008%20Self%20and%20Other%20Pronin.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T17:30:18.067548Z</更新>; <link href="http://courses.washington.edu/pbafhall/514/514%20Readings/2008%20Self%20and%20Other% 20Pronin.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;yamrzou</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yamrzou</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;人们看待自己的方式与看待他人的方式不同。这种基本的不对称会导致分歧和冲突。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-we-see-ourselves-and-how-we-see-others-2008-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811861" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;计算机简史</stitle>; <id>;https://www.lesswrong.com/posts/vfRpzyGsikujm9ujj/a-brief-history-of-computers</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T14:30:18.068359Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.lesswrong.com /posts/vfRpzyGsikujm9ujj/a-brief-history-of-computers"/>; <作者>; <名称>;zdw </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zdw</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://39669.cdn.cke-cs.com/rQvD3VnunXZu34m86e 5f/images/c57999325bc3b993c35e30d580fedceaede559951af156e1.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：74px；" />;<br />;计算机的历史可以追溯到亚里士多德在逻辑方面的开创性工作。 George Boole 在 1800 年代中期进一步发展了布尔逻辑。提花织机是一种使用打孔卡的织布机，它启发了查尔斯·巴贝奇 (Charles Babbage) 创建了差分机，这是一种用于计算数学表格的机器。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-brief-history-of-computers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36826210" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;复杂系统的弹性（2021）</stitle>; <id>;https://irhum.github.io/blog/resilientsystems/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T16:30:18.069192Z</updated>; <link href="https://irhum.github.io/blog/resilientsystems/"/>; <author>; <name>;grobby</name>; <uri>;https://news.y combinator.com/user?id=grobby</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://irhum.github.io/blog/resilientsystems/assets/timeseries.png" style="width: 220px; height: 75px;" />;<br />;我们的日常生活围绕着具有明确因果机制的抽象系统展开。但当涉及到不断变化的系统时，我们日常的因果直觉却让我们失望了。本文通过系统思维的范式探讨了这些现象，并研究了复杂系统对变化的弹性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#resilience-in-complex-systems-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36827534" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;是时候带回庇护所了吗？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wsj.com/articles/its-time-to-bring-back-the-asylum-ec01fb2</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T17:30:18.070028Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/its-time-to-br ing-back-the-asylum-ec01fb2"/>; <作者>; <名称>;sam345</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sam345</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.wsj.net/im-820388/?width=1000&size=0.8" style="width: 220px; height: 275 像素；” />;<br />;美国严重精神病患者的传奇故事以一种令人悲伤的熟悉方式再次引起人们的关注。 2022 年初，洛杉矶一名 70 岁的护士在等公交车时被谋杀，两天后，一名年轻的研究生在她工作的一家高档家具店被刺死。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#time-to-bring-back-asylums" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36826335" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;拥抱复杂性；收紧您的反馈循环</stitle>; <id>;https://ferd.ca/embrace-complexity-tighten-your-feedback-loops.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T12:30:18.072551Z</updated>; <link href="https://ferd.ca/embrace-complexity-tighten-your-feedback-loops.html"/>; <author>; <name>;luzh</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luzh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ferd.ca/static/img/qcon-ny2023/01.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;在本文中，作者讨论了在处理生活和系统时拥抱复杂性和收紧反馈循环的重要性。他们认为，系统总是会面临挑战和压力，将它们推向混乱的边缘，而试图控制和消除复杂性可能会产生更多问题。相反，作者建议在引导事情上发挥有限的影响力，以尽可能长时间地推迟混乱。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#embrace-complexity-tighten-your-feedback-loops" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36825345" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;啤酒啤酒花在太阳能电池板下蓬勃发展</stitle>; <id>;https://apnews.com/article/climate-beer-solar-panels-hops-germany-ee3d00a1877837eb85053335e3b68a00</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T21:30:18.074138Z</updated >; <link href="https://apnews.com/article/climate-beer-solar-panels-hops-germany-ee3d00a1877837eb85053335e3b68a00"/>; <作者>; <name>;TazeTSchnitzel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=TazeTSchnitzel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://dims.apnews.com/dims4/default/8f60796/2147483647/strip/true/crop/3104x1744+0+163/resize/500x281!/quality/90/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.apnews.com%2Fd1%2Fc7%2F466c66b47 06bc99c2f91f66f3da5%2Fe629f16681314c51b7e5f301660ca6ac"样式="宽度：220px；高度：124px;" />;<br />;在巴伐利亚州 Josef Wimmer 的农场，亮绿色的藤蔓蜿蜒向上 20 英尺，伸向太阳能电池板伞。他种植啤酒花，用于酿造啤酒，近年来还开始发电，太阳能电池板遍布他 1.3 公顷的土地。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hops-for-beer-flourish-under-solar- panel" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36829672" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;重要编码习惯</stitle>; <id>;https://puppycoding。 com/2023/07/22/healthy-coding-habits/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T15:30:18.075797Z</updated>; <link href="https://puppycoding.com/2023/07/22/healthy-coding-habits/"/>; <author>; <name>;takawa</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=田川</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://puppycodingcom.files.wordpress.com/2023/07/old-monsters.webp?w=1024" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;最重要的编码习惯是那些使我们能够在未来几年和几十年里享受这门手艺的习惯。编程时养成不健康的习惯可能会导致背痛和其他健康问题。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#important-coding-habits" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=368267 55" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;消费者软件预计将成为下一个快速增长的细分市场 (1994 年)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.csmonitor.com/1994/0513/13082.html</id>; <updated>;2023-0 7-22T14:30:18.076630Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.csmonitor.com/1994/0513/13082.html"/>; <author>; <name>;1970-01-01</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=1970-01-01</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<im g src="https://images.csmonitor.com/csm/2019/11/1025853_6_Mark-Sappenfield-drawing_standard.png?alias=square_400x400" style="宽度：220px； height: 221px;" />;<br />;消费类软件预计将在未来几年成为该行业增长最快的部分。软件行业的主要参与者正在将其前景扩展到家庭市场，因为现在有近三分之一的美国家庭拥有电脑。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#consumer-software-is-expected-to-be-next-fast-forming-segment-1994" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36813688" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;BP：正式证明、精美印刷和副作用（2018）[pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https:// people.scs.carleton.ca/~paulv/papers/secdev2018.pdf</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T15:30:18.078059Z</updated>; <link href="https://people.scs.carleton.ca/~paulv/papers/secdev2018.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;鉴于最近在安全相关属性的形式验证方面取得的引人注目的成功，我们重新审视了软件安全相关证明的含义。我们考虑软件系统证明的价值和副作用以及证明和副作用之间的关系。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bp-formal-proofs-the-fine-print-and-side-effects-2018-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818602" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么这些藻类在池子里长成这样？</stitle>; <id>;https://physicals.stackexchange.com/questions/772882/why-did-these-algae-grow-like-this-in-the-pool-are-these-curves-the-gravitation</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T12:3 0:18.078871Z</updated>; <link href="https://physicals.stackexchange.com/questions/772882/why-did-these-algae-grow-like-this-in-the-pool-are-these-curves-the-gravitation"/>; <作者>; <name>;pyinstallwoes</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pyinstallwoes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/D1HNQ.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 294px;" />;<br />;我的朋友给我发了这些已经废弃很长时间的水池的照片，我们很好奇这种图案中藻类的奇特生长背后的原因。藻类的针状塔似乎类似于数学方程 z = 1/(x^2 + y^2)。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-did-these-algae-grow-like-this-in-the-pool" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36825119" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用 PyTorch 计算化学</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Mariewelt/OpenChem</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T12:30:18.079656Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/Mariewelt/OpenChem"/>; <author>; <name>;gtsnexp</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gtsnexp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Mariewelt/OpenChem/master/docs/logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 101px;" />;<br />;OpenChem 是一个具有 PyTorch 后端的计算化学深度学习工具包。 OpenChem 的目标是使深度学习模型成为计算化学和药物设计研究人员易于使用的工具。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#computational-chemistry-using-pytorch" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36825353" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;Shopify 员工违反保密协议，透露公司用人工智能替换下岗工人</stitle>; <id>;https://thedeepdive.ca/shopify-employee-breaks-nda-to-reveal-firm-quietly-replacing-laid-off-workers-with-ai/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T18:30:18.080445Z</updated>; <link href="https ://thedeepdive.ca/shopify-employee-breaks-nda-to-reveal-firm-quietly-replacing-laid-off-workers-with-ai/"/>; <author>; <name>;notRobot</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=notRobot</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://thedeepdive.ca/wp-content/up加载/2023/07/header-template-71-800x445.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 123px;" />;<br />;一名 Shopify 员工违反了保密协议 (NDA)，泄露了公司有争议的行为和战略方向。该员工揭露了 Shopify 如何承诺工作保障，但却进行了大规模裁员，用更便宜的合同工和人工智能支持取代了全职员工。 Shopify 对人工智能技术的关注对客户满意度产生了负面影响，并引发了对其员工福祉的担忧。公司目标市场重心的转变以及裁员的秘密处理让员工对管理层的承诺产生了怀疑。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#shopify-employee-breaks-nda-to-reveal-firm-replacing-laid-off-workers-with-ai" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36828409" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;构建2-3棵树（2018）[pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cambridge.org/core/services/aop-cambridge-core/content/view/129759AE03543B461536F78B386D93B5/S0956796818 000187a.pdf/on-constructing-2-3-trees.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T16:30:18.081221Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.cambridge.org/core/services/aop-cambridge-core/content/view/129759AE03543B461536F78B386D93B5 /S0956796818000187a.pdf/on-constructing-2-3-trees.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;082349872349872</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=082349872349872</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;2-3 树是第一个被赋予适当的功能治疗。它们是二叉树，所有叶子都出现在同一水平上。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#on-constructing-2-3-trees-2018-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
